name: codecation-1

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.build: npm run tailwind:css && NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack.config.js
scripts.deploy: npm run tailwind:css && npm run clean && npm i --only=dev && NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --progress && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -f package-lock.json && npm i --only=prod
scripts.rebuild: npm run tailwind:css && NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --progress --colors

author: Perry Raskin, Ari Mendelow, Joey Pinhas
